#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define FORI(i,b,e) for(int i=b; i<=e; i++)
#define FORD(i,b,e) for(int i=b; i>=e; i--)
#define FILL(a, v) memset(a, v, sizeof(a))
#define FOREACH(it,c) for(__typeof((c).begin()) it=((c).begin());it!=(c).end();++it)
#define mp make_pair
#define mod 1000000007
#define INF 1000000001

typedef long long LL;
typedef vector<int> VI;
typedef vector<LL> VLL;
typedef pair<int, int> PII;

//**************************************** <global variable> *********************************
int n;
int Tree[100002];
//******************************************* <main code> ************************************

void update(int idx, int val)
{
    while(idx<=n)
    {
        Tree[idx]+=val;
        idx+=(idx & -idx);
    }
}

int query(int idx)
{
    int sum=0;
    while(idx>0)
    {
        sum+=Tree[idx];
        idx-=(idx & -idx);
    }
    return sum;
}

void solve()
{
    FORI(i, 1, n)
    {
        update(i, 1);
    }
    FORI(i, 1, n)
    {
        int num;
        scanf("%d", &num);
        printf("%d ", query(num));
        update(num, -1);
    }
    printf("\n");
    FILL(Tree, 0);
}

int main()
{
    int tc=1;
    scanf("%d", &tc);
    while(tc--)
    {
        scanf("%d", &n);
        solve();
    }
}
